search.query: web_server=$web_server$ tag=web tag=activity | eval 4xx=if(status >= 400 AND status < 500, status, null()), 5xx=if(status >= 500 AND status < 600, status, null()) | stats count(_raw) as requests, count(4xx) as 4xx, count(5xx) as 5xx, avg(response_time) as response_time by uri_path | fields + uri_path, requests, 4xx, 5xx, response_time | sort -requests, -5xx, -4xx, -response_time
